text: Скажите, зачем требовать от *ML Engineer  "*Уверенное знание SQL"? Если вы в состоянии это так уж точно проверить, так и поставляйте запрошенные им выборки. Или вы в состоянии более-менее проверять знания исключительно и только SQL и проверяете то, что можете, а не то, что нужно?

text: The <https://salesforce.wd1.myworkdayjobs.com/en-US/External_Career_Site/job/Israel---Tel-Aviv/Senior-Lead-Software-Engineer--Platform-Infrastructure_JR84348|job description> link was posted along with the message. The salary range at this level hugely depend on the candidate.

attachments.title: Principal /Architect Software Engineer- Platform/Infrastructure
attachments.text: To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts. Job CategoryProducts and Technology Job Details Your Impact: In this role you will have a key role in designing and implementing cloud-based infrastructure and platform tools for data-driven and ML components. This role requires high technical skills along with a strong affinity for architecture, web-scaling, performance, data modeling, and developing solutions to improve the performance and scalability of systems. You will be leading the R&D team’s development methodology, tools and frameworks and make a significant impact on the “go-to-production” process for an auto-scaled cloud system.  Who You’ll Work With: You will be a part of Einstein, who is an AI technology that makes all Salesforce products smarter. In Einstein, we develop AI solutions for Sales rep, Sales manager and more. We automate data entry and predictive analysis so our customers can make every selling moment count. Our AI solution prioritizes the best next steps, help to win more opportunities, make better decisions, increase forecast accuracy and more. Salesforce Israel group is made up of data scientists, engineers, and growth analysts who are dedicated to driving product strategy with data-driven insights. The team works with executives, product managers, designers, developers, user researchers, marketers, and sales strategy team members across all Cloud businesses to discover new opportunities for growth and optimization, experiment with data, drive adoption, and provide actionable insights that impact product strategy.  Responsibilities: Build Machine Learning Platform for Salesforce Engineers and Data Scientists to build ML-powered apps and experiences “The platform” used across Salesforce for existing and new Machine Learning apps Utilize best architecture/capabilities across different underlying platforms while avoiding duplication of functionality (ie one implementation of each of major ML component) Continuously measure, optimize and refine an ever-growing microservice architecture system, serving millions of requests a day Develop software solutions by studying information needs; studying systems flow, data usage, and work processes; investigating problem areas; following the software development lifecycle Conduct code and design reviews, ensuring high code quality Support software engineers by providing advice, coaching and educational opportunities   Required Qualifications: 8+ years of experience coding in Java/Python and Open-source environment Experience with Cloud technologies like AWS, GCP, Containers, Kubernetes, Service Mesh Experience with Relational DB and NoSQL DB like MySql, Aurora, MongoDB, Couchbase, Cassandra, DynamoDB Experience with architecture methodologies and paradigms like microservices, distributed development Familiarity with open source frameworks/libs: Netflix OSS, Spring boot, Akka, Play Framework, Celery, etc. Experience in dealing with performance and scaling issues Ability to complete task “End to End” - from design and implementation to continuous deployment in production Great communication skill and teamwork Ability to work effectively in an unstructured and fast-paced environment both independently and in a team setting, with a high degree of self-management with clear communication and commitment to delivery timelines Ability to prioritize and execute multiple tasks in a highly dynamic environment with a results-oriented mindset B.Sc. degree in Computer Science or equivalent/related degree Accommodations - If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form. Posting Statement At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at Salesforce and explore our benefits. <http://Salesforce.com|Salesforce.com> and <http://Salesforce.org|Salesforce.org> are Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employers. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. <http://Salesforce.com|Salesforce.com> and <http://Salesforce.org|Salesforce.org> do not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. <http://Salesforce.com|Salesforce.com> and <http://Salesforce.org|Salesforce.org> will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with <http://Salesfore.com|Salesfore.com> or <http://Salesforce.org|Salesforce.org>. Salesforce welcomes all.
